M13/1/AXHIN/HP1/HIN/TZ0/XX




     22130093

HINDI A: LITERATURE – HIGHER LEVEL – PAPER 1
HINDI A : LITTéRATURE – NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR – ÉPREUVE 1
HINDI A: LITERATURA – NIVEL SUPERIOR – PRUEBA 1

Wednesday 8 May 2013 (morning)
Mercredi 8 mai 2013 (matin)
Miércoles 8 de mayo de 2013 (mañana)

2 hours / 2 heures / 2 horas


Instructions to candidates

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a literary commentary on one passage only.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez un commentaire littéraire sur un seul des passages.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [20 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un comentario literario sobre un solo pasaje.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].




2213-0093                                                                                 5 pages/páginas

            piScamaI saMgaIt kI kao[- bahut manamaaohk Qauna baja rhI qaI. “Aaoh AbbaU, yaU Aar ga`oT !” “Aba tuma hd sao baahr hao rho hao”

     gae.kmar nao ]naka baayaaM haqa Apnao haqa maoM ilayaa dUsara haqa pIz pICo rKa AaOr vah baajao kI Qauna ko saaqa Aagao-pICo,
     dae^M-baae^M GaUma GaUma kr naacanao lagaa.AbbaU BaI saaqa-saaqa iGasaT rho qao, saaqa hI knaiKyaaoM sao [Qar-]Qar takto BaI jaato qao
     ik kao[- doK kr h^Msa tao nahIM rha hO ? baa,kr saahba ko GauTnao dao-caar baar k,mar ko pOraoM AaOr GauTnaaoM sao Tkrae laoikna
     ifr ]nhoM kao[- id@kt poSa nahIM Aa[-.saaocaa [sa laD,ko nao Aaja mauJao maa^Dna- baud\Za banaa idyaa, Aba yah Agar mauJao DOD
  40 khkr pukarta hO tao maOM eotraja nahIM k$^Mgaa. [sa baIca ek dbaMga laD,kI nao k,mar kao Aakr Qakola idyaa AaOr mauskrato
     hue ]sanao baak,r saahba kao saInao sao lagaakr naacanaa Sau$ kr idyaa.laD,kI nao ]nako kana maoM kha, @yaaoM Gabarata hO yaU
     AaolD-Aa[ maIna yaMga-maOna, hma tumhoM Ka nahIM jaaegaa.laoikna baak,r saahba haqa CuD,akr haMfto hue ApnaI maoja pr Aa
     gae.]nhaoMnao ApnaI jaoba kao TTaolaa. ]naka baTuAa gaayaba qaa.laD,kI Apnaa kama kr ga[- qaI.]sa BaID, maoM baak,r saahba
     kI Aa^MKaoM nao ]sao bahutora tlaaSaa laoikna vah naja,r nahIM Aa[-.baap-baoTa rat ko ek bajao ko krIba jaba haoTla sao calao tao
  45 baak,r saahba kao eosaa mahsaUsa hao rha qaa jaOsao vao ifr sao javaana hao gae hOM.]nhaoMnao mana hI mana k,mar ka Sauik`yaa Ada ikyaa.

2.

                                    jaba ibakto nahIM

                 raoja ibaknao Sahr Aata hU^M ,
                 gaa^Mva sao pa^Mva pOdla calakr,
                 Sahr ko caaOk-caaOraho pr
                 vastuAaoM ko jamaGaT maoM Saaimala hao,
            5    ek Tk inaharta hU^M , ga`ahkaoM kI Aaor
                 AaSaa BarI naja,raoM sao ik vao mauJao
                 KrId laoMgao Aaja Saama tk ko ilae.
                 vastu haokr BaI vastu sao iBanna,
                 inajaI-va nahIM, sajaIva hU^M
            10   AgaitSaIla nahIM gaitSaIla hU^M
                 ivak`ota Wara nahIM,
                 svayaM ga`ahkaoM ko haqaao ibaknao kI ifk` krta hU^M ,.
                 Alaga Alaga ga`ahkaoM ko haqaaoM ibak jaata hU^M
                 inat ]nasao du%kar, iJaD,ikyaa^M saunata hU^M.
            15   ijasa idna Pyaar ko dao baaola ]nasao saunata hU^M ,
                 mana Aahlaaidt hao jaata hO.
                 ijasa idna ibak jaata hU^M .
                 vah idna [-d ka haota hO ,
                 raoTI ka jaugaaD, ilae
            20   KuSaI mana sao Gar laaOTta hU^M.
                 maa^Mga- pUit- ko Kola maoM
                 ijasa idna ibak nahIM pata hU^M
                 ]sa idna KalaI haqa
                 BaarI mana, raoTI kI icaMta maoM Gar laaOTta hU^M.
            25   Gar phu^Mca, saUnao Gar kI caaOKT pr
                 vyaakula mana sao
                 GarnaI kI p`tIxaa krta hU^M ,
                 ek AaSaa ilae, ik vah
                 baID,I banaakr laaOTogaI
            30   saaqa maoM caMd $pe laaegaI.

               vah AaSa BaI jaba flaIBaUt nahIM haota
               tba kla kI AaSa maoM
               phlao tao ]QaarI gaa^Mva ko bainae sao,
               jaba ]mmaIdaoM ka kla kBaI nahIM Aata
            35 tba ifr mahajanaaoM ko SaaoYaNa cak` maoM
               fMsanao kao majabaUr hao jaata hU^M.
               maaOnasaUna ko jaUe maoM harkr
               gaa^Mva baMjar hao calaa hO
               Sahr maoM macaa hO hahakar panaI ka
            40 GaT gayaa hO inamaa-Na kaya-
               naamaumaikna hao gayaa hO iflahala maora ibaknaa.

                                                        Da^ naagaoSvar Samaa-, ]<ara, jaulaa[- (2006)
